name: Luminoso
description:
Luminoso is a puzzle game with laser beams. The goal of each puzzle is to make all laser beams hit the receiver pieces of their respective color.Features
  • Many unique piece types, each with different effects.
  • Lasers may have different beam colors. Colors can be mixed to produce new colors, or split into their component colors.
  • 60 hand-crafted levels with varying difficulty.
  • A level editor to create your own levels.
  • Chilling music that doesn't get on your nerves.
